title: My friends call me Tony
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Yuki Yoshida, Kathleen Shannon and Beverly Shaffer
brief_description: The film is about a ten-year-old boy who can distinguish only light from shadow. Despite this difficulty, he leads a very active life. The film shows how Tony Rossi manages his life. Awards: Lausanne; Los Angeles.
